location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Joseph Phillips, Commander of the HC Cruizer Vestal

mods.abstract: The letter is tasking the commander with delivering a packet of intelligence from Europe to Bombay. Enclosed with the letter is a communication to be delivered to the commander of the Country Ship Rhaimshaw[ Rhaim Shaw] should he come across her; the enclosed letter orders the return of the Rhaimshawto Bushire, as it is Persian property.
